sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import './ExperienceCards.css'; import { FaClock, FaMapMarkerAlt, FaInfoCircle, FaShoppingCart } from 'react-icons/fa'; const ExperienceCards = () => { const experiences = [ { title: "Ancienne Médina", price: "Free", guidedTour: "Guided tour from MAD 400", distance: "Distance from Hassan II Mosque", times: ["4 min", "20 min"], image: "https://tse4.explicit.bing.net/th?id=OIP.v50Vitgvj6Esegh4_OpM9gHaEo&pid=Api&P=0&h=180" }, { title: "Ancienne Médina", price: "Free", guidedTour: "Guided tour from MAD 400", distance: "Distance from Hassan II Mosque", times: ["4 min", "20 min"], image: "https://tse4.explicit.bing.net/th?id=OIP.v50Vitgvj6Esegh4_OpM9gHaEo&pid=Api&P=0&h=180" }, { title: "Ancienne Médina", price: "Free", guidedTour: "Guided tour from MAD 400", distance: "Distance from Hassan II Mosque", times: ["4 min", "20 min"], image: "https://tse4.explicit.bing.net/th?id=OIP.v50Vitgvj6Esegh4_OpM9gHaEo&pid=Api&P=0&h=180" }, { title: "Ancienne Médina", price: "Free", guidedTour: "Guided tour from MAD 400", distance: "Distance from Hassan II Mosque", times: ["4 min", "20 min"], image: "https://tse4.explicit.bing.net/th?id=OIP.v50Vitgvj6Esegh4_OpM9gHaEo&pid=Api&P=0&h=180" }, { title: "Hassan II Mosque", price: "From 80 DH", guidedTour: "Guided tour from MAD 400", distance: "Distance from airport 15kms", times: ["4 min", "20 min"], image: "https://tse3.mm.bing.net/th?id=OIP.yLVPTd3QmWQXlMBKB1lDYAHaEo&pid=Api&P=0&h=180" } ]; return (
{experiences.map((exp, index) => (

{exp.title}

{exp.price}
{exp.guidedTour}
{exp.distance}
{exp.times[0]}
{exp.times[1]}
))}
); }; export default ExperienceCards;
